00104 #define HPSS_SSM "hpss_ssm"

00107 int lru_entry_to_str( LRU_data_t data, char * str) 
00108 {
00109   cache_entry_t * pentry = NULL ;
00110   
00111   pentry =  (cache_entry_t *)data.pdata ;
00112   
00113   return sprintf( str, "Pentry: Addr %p, state=%d", pentry, pentry->internal_md.valid_state ) ;
00114 } /* lru_entry_to_str */
00115 
00116 int lru_clean_entry( LRU_entry_t * entry, void * adddata) 
00117 {
00118   return 0 ;
00119 } /* lru_clean_entry */

00134 main(int argc, char * argv[] )
00135 {
00136   log_t log_desc_fsal = LOG_INITIALIZER;
00137   log_t log_desc_cache =  LOG_INITIALIZER;
00138   char  localmachine[256] ;
00139   desc_log_stream_t  voie_fsal ;
00140   desc_log_stream_t  voie_cache ;
00141 
00142   cache_inode_client_t client ;
00143   LRU_parameter_t lru_param ;
00144   LRU_status_t lru_status ;
00145   cache_inode_fsal_data_t fsdata ;
00146   
00147   fsal_status_t   status;
00148   fsal_parameter_t  init_param;
00149   fsal_name_t name;
00150   fsal_path_t path;
00151   fsal_attrib_mask_t mask;
00152   fsal_path_t pathroot ;
00153   fsal_attrib_list_t attribs;
00154   fsal_handle_t root_handle ;
00155 
00156   cache_inode_endofdir_t eod_met ;
00157   cache_inode_dir_entry_t dirent_array[100] ;
00158   cache_inode_dir_entry_t dirent_array_loop[5] ;
00159   unsigned int nbfound ;
00160   
00161   unsigned int begin_cookie = 0 ;
00162   hash_buffer_t key, value ;
00163   
00164   uid_t uid;
00165   fsal_cred_t cred;
00166 
00167   cache_inode_status_t  cache_status ;
00168   cache_inode_parameter_t cache_param ;
00169   cache_inode_client_parameter_t cache_client_param ;
00170   
00171   hash_table_t * ht = NULL ;
00172   fsal_attrib_list_t attrlookup ;
00173   cache_entry_t * cache_entry_root   = NULL ;
00174   cache_entry_t * cache_entry_lookup = NULL ;
00175   cache_entry_t * cache_entry_lookup2 = NULL ;
00176   cache_entry_t * cache_entry_lookup3 = NULL ;
00177   cache_entry_t * cache_entry_lookup4 = NULL ;
00178   cache_entry_t * cache_entry_lookup5 = NULL ;
00179   cache_entry_t * cache_entry_lookup6 = NULL ;
00180   cache_entry_t * cache_entry_dircont = NULL ;
00181   
00182   cache_inode_gc_policy_t gcpol ;
00183   
00184   char * configfile = argv[1] ;
00185   int i = 0 ;
00186   int rc = 0 ;
00187   
00188   /* Init the Buddy System allocation */
00189   if( ( rc = BuddyInit( NULL ) ) != BUDDY_SUCCESS )
00190     {
00191       fprintf( stderr, "Error while Initing the Buddy system allocator"  ) ;
00192       exit( 1 ) ;
00193     }
00194 
00195   /* init debug */
00196   SetNamePgm( "test_cache_inode" ) ;
00197   SetNameFunction( "main" ) ;
00198   SetNameFileLog( "/dev/tty" ) ;
00199 
00200 #if defined( _USE_GHOSTFS )
00201   if( argc != 2 )
00202     {
00203       fprintf( stderr, "Please set the configuration file as parameter\n" ) ;
00204       exit( 1 ) ;
00205     }
00206 #endif
00207   
00208   
00209   /* Obtention du nom de la machine */
00210   if( gethostname( localmachine, sizeof( localmachine ) ) != 0 )
00211     {
00212       DisplayErrorLog( ERR_SYS, ERR_GETHOSTNAME, errno ) ;
00213       exit( 1 ) ;
00214     }
00215   else
00216     SetNameHost( localmachine ) ;
00217   
00218   InitDebug( NIV_FULL_DEBUG ) ;
00219   AddFamilyError( ERR_FSAL, "FSAL related Errors", tab_errstatus_FSAL ) ;  AddFamilyError( ERR_CACHE_INODE, "FSAL related Errors", tab_errstatus_cache_inode ) ;
00220   
00221   /* creating log */
00222   voie_fsal.fd = fileno( stdout ) ;
00223   AddLogStreamJd( &log_desc_fsal, V_FD,voie_fsal,NIV_FULL_DEBUG,SUP);
00224 
00225   voie_cache.fd = fileno( stdout ) ;
00226   AddLogStreamJd( &log_desc_cache, V_FD,voie_cache,NIV_FULL_DEBUG,SUP);
00227   
00228   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Starting the test" ) ;
00229   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "-----------------" ) ;
00230 
00231 #if defined( _USE_GHOSTFS )  
00232 
00233   if (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2path( configfile, 
00234                                              strlen( configfile )+1,
00235                                              &(init_param.fs_specific_info.definition_file ) ) ) )
00236     {
00237       DisplayErrorJd(log_desc_fsal,ERR_FSAL,status.major,status.minor);
00238     }
00239   
00240 
00241 #elif defined( _USE_HPSS )
00242  
00243   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, Flags);
00244   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, DebugValue);
00245   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, TransferType);
00246   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, NumRetries);
00247   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, BusyDelay);
00248   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, BusyRetries);
00249   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, TotalDelay);
00250   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, GKTotalDelay);
00251   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, LimitedRetries);
00252   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, MaxConnections);
00253   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, ReuseDataConnections);
00254   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, UsePortRange);
00255   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, RetryStageInp);
00256   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, DMAPWriteUpdates);
00257   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, ServerName);
00258   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, DescName);
00259   
00260   init_param.fs_specific_info.behaviors.PrincipalName = FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE;
00261   strncpy(init_param.fs_specific_info.hpss_config.PrincipalName, 
00262           HPSS_SSM, 
00263           HPSS_MAX_PRINCIPAL_NAME);  
00264 
00265   
00266   init_param.fs_specific_info.behaviors.KeytabPath = FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE ;
00267   strncpy(init_param.fs_specific_info.hpss_config.KeytabPath,
00268           HPSS_KEYTAB,
00269           HPSS_MAX_PATH_NAME);
00270 
00271   
00272   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, DebugPath);
00273   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, HostName);
00274   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, RegistrySiteName);
00275 
00276 #endif
00277   /* 2-common info (default) */
00278   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info,maxfilesize);
00279   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info,maxlink);
00280   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, maxnamelen);
00281   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, maxpathlen);
00282   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, no_trunc);
00283   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, chown_restricted);
00284   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, case_insensitive);
00285   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, case_preserving);
00286   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, fh_expire_type);
00287   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, link_support);
00288   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, symlink_support);  
00289   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, named_attr);
00290   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, unique_handles);
00291   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, lease_time);
00292   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, acl_support);
00293   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, cansettime);
00294   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, homogenous);
00295   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, maxread);
00296   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, maxwrite);
00297   
00298   /* 3- fsal info*/
00299   init_param.fsal_info.log_outputs = log_desc_fsal;
00300   
00301   /* Init */
00302   if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_Init( &init_param ) ) )
00303     {
00304       DisplayErrorJd(log_desc_fsal,ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00305     }
00306 
00307    /* getting creds */
00308   uid=getuid(); 
00309   
00310   if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_GetUserCred( uid, NULL, &cred ) ) )
00311     {
00312       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00313     }
00314   
00315   /* Init of the cache inode module */
00316   cache_param.hparam.index_size       = 31 ;
00317   cache_param.hparam.alphabet_length  = 10 ; /* Buffer seen as a decimal polynom */
00318   cache_param.hparam.nb_node_prealloc = 100 ;
00319   cache_param.hparam.hash_func_key    = cache_inode_fsal_hash_func ;
00320   cache_param.hparam.hash_func_rbt    = cache_inode_fsal_rbt_func ;
00321   cache_param.hparam.compare_key      = cache_inode_compare_key_fsal ;
00322   cache_param.hparam.key_to_str       = display_key ;
00323   cache_param.hparam.val_to_str       = display_value ;
00324 
00325   if( ( ht = cache_inode_init( cache_param, &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00326     {
00327       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error %d while init hash ", cache_status ) ;
00328     }
00329   else
00330     DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Hash Table address = %p", ht ) ;
00331 
00332   /* We need a cache_client to acces the cache */  
00333   cache_client_param.log_outputs = log_desc_cache;
00334   cache_client_param.attrmask = FSAL_ATTRS_MANDATORY|FSAL_ATTR_MTIME|FSAL_ATTR_CTIME|FSAL_ATTR_ATIME  ; 
00335   cache_client_param.nb_prealloc_entry = 1000 ;
00336   cache_client_param.nb_pre_dir_data = 200 ;
00337   cache_client_param.nb_pre_parent = 1200 ;
00338   cache_client_param.nb_pre_state_v4 = 100 ;
00339   
00340   cache_client_param.lru_param.nb_entry_prealloc = 1000 ;
00341   cache_client_param.lru_param.entry_to_str = lru_entry_to_str ;
00342   cache_client_param.lru_param.clean_entry = lru_clean_entry ;
00343 
00344   cache_client_param.grace_period_attr = 0 ; 
00345   cache_client_param.grace_period_link = 0 ; 
00346 
00347 
00348   /* Init the cache_inode client */
00349   if( cache_inode_client_init( &client, cache_client_param, 0 ) != 0 )
00350     exit( 1 ) ;
00351 
00352   /* Getting the root of the FS */
00353   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2path( "/", 2, &pathroot) )) )
00354     {
00355       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00356       exit( 1 ) ;
00357     }
00358   
00359   attribs.asked_attributes = cache_client_param.attrmask ;
00360   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_lookupPath( pathroot, &cred, &root_handle, &attribs ) ) ) )
00361     {
00362       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00363       exit( 1 ) ;
00364     }
00365   fsdata.cookie = 0 ;
00366   fsdata.handle = root_handle ;
00367   
00368   /* Cache the root of the FS */
00369   if( ( cache_entry_root = cache_inode_make_root( &fsdata, 1, ht, &client, &cred, &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00370     {
00371       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't init fs's root" ) ;
00372       exit( 1 ) ;
00373     }
00374 
00375   cache_inode_print_dir( cache_entry_root ) ;
00376 
00377   /* Test readdir */
00378   if( cache_inode_readdir( cache_entry_root,
00379                            0, 
00380                            100,
00381                            &nbfound,
00382                            &eod_met, 
00383                            dirent_array, 
00384                            ht, 
00385                            &client, 
00386                            &cred, 
00387                            &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00388     {
00389       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: cache_inode_readdir failed\n" ) ;
00390       exit( 1 ) ;
00391     }
00392 
00393   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Readdir nbfound=%d, eod_met=%d", nbfound, eod_met ) ;
00394   for( i = 0 ; i < nbfound ; i++ )
00395     DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "dirent_array[%d] ==> %s | %p", i, dirent_array[i].name.name, dirent_array[i].pentry ) ;
00396 
00397   cache_inode_print_dir( cache_entry_root ) ;
00398   
00399   /* looping on readir */
00400   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Loop directory in several pass" ) ;
00401   
00402   eod_met = TO_BE_CONTINUED ;
00403   begin_cookie = 0 ;
00404   
00405   do
00406     {
00407       
00408       if( cache_inode_readdir( cache_entry_root,
00409                                begin_cookie, 
00410                                2, 
00411                                &nbfound,
00412                                &eod_met, 
00413                                dirent_array_loop, 
00414                                ht, 
00415                                &client, 
00416                                &cred, 
00417                                &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00418       {
00419         printf( "Error: cache_inode_readdir failed: %d\n", cache_status ) ;
00420         exit( 1 ) ;
00421       }
00422       
00423       for( i = 0 ; i < nbfound ; i++ )
00424         DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, " ==> %s | %p", dirent_array_loop[i].name.name,  dirent_array_loop[i].pentry ) ;
00425 
00426 
00427       begin_cookie += nbfound ;
00428       
00429     } while ( eod_met == TO_BE_CONTINUED ) ;
00430   
00431   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "---------------------------------" ) ;
00432 
00433   cache_inode_print_dir( cache_entry_root ) ;
00434 
00435   /* A lookup in the root fsal */
00436   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2name( "cea", 10, &name )  ) ) )
00437     {
00438       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00439       exit( 1 ) ;
00440     }
00441 
00442   if( ( cache_entry_lookup = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00443                                                  name, 
00444                                                  &attrlookup, 
00445                                                  ht, 
00446                                                  &client, 
00447                                                  &cred, 
00448                                                  &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00449     {
00450       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00451       exit( 1 ) ;
00452     }
00453 
00454   /* Lookup a second time (entry should now be cached) */
00455   if( ( cache_entry_lookup2 = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00456                                                   name, 
00457                                                   &attrlookup, 
00458                                                   ht, 
00459                                                   &client, 
00460                                                   &cred, 
00461                                                   &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00462     {
00463       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_fsal, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00464       exit( 1 ) ;
00465     }
00466  
00467   if( cache_entry_lookup2 != cache_entry_lookup ) 
00468     {
00469       printf( "Error: lookup results should be the same\n" ) ;
00470       exit( 1 ) ;
00471     }
00472   
00473    /* A lookup in the root fsal */
00474   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2name( "log", 10, &name )  ) ) )
00475     {
00476       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00477       exit( 1 ) ;
00478     }
00479 
00480   if( ( cache_entry_lookup3 = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00481                                                   name, 
00482                                                   &attrlookup, 
00483                                                   ht, 
00484                                                   &client, 
00485                                                   &cred, 
00486                                                   &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00487     {
00488       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00489       exit( 1 ) ;
00490     }
00491   
00492   if( ( cache_entry_lookup4 = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00493                                                   name, 
00494                                                   &attrlookup, 
00495                                                   ht, 
00496                                                   &client, 
00497                                                   &cred, 
00498                                                   &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00499     {
00500       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00501       exit( 1 ) ;
00502     }
00503 
00504   if( cache_entry_lookup3 != cache_entry_lookup4 ) 
00505     {
00506       printf( "Error: lookup results should be the same\n" ) ;
00507       exit( 1 ) ;
00508     }
00509   
00510    /* A lookup in the root fsal */
00511   cache_inode_print_dir( cache_entry_root ) ;
00512 
00513   /* A lookup in the root fsal */
00514   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2name( "cea", 10, &name )  ) ) )
00515     {
00516       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00517       exit( 1 ) ;
00518     }
00519   
00520   
00521   if( ( cache_entry_lookup = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00522                                                  name, 
00523                                                  &attrlookup, 
00524                                                  ht, 
00525                                                  &client, 
00526                                                  &cred, 
00527                                                  &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00528     {
00529       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00530       exit( 1 ) ;
00531     }
00532 
00533   /* A lookup in the root fsal */
00534   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2name( "log", 10, &name )  ) ) )
00535     {
00536       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00537       exit( 1 ) ;
00538     }
00539 
00540   if( ( cache_entry_lookup = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00541                                                  name, 
00542                                                  &attrlookup, 
00543                                                  ht, 
00544                                                  &client, 
00545                                                  &cred, 
00546                                                  &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00547     {
00548       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00549       exit( 1 ) ;
00550     }
00551   
00552   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "---------------------------------" ) ;
00553   
00554   /* The end of all the tests */
00555   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "All tests exited successfully" ) ;
00556   
00557   exit( 0 ) ;
00558 } /* main */
00559
